g.title: Meningioma Detected
g.text: Meningioma Detected

g.title: Symptomatic?
g.text: Symptomatic?

g.title: Meningioma Detected->Symptomatic?
g.text: Incidental or symptomatic (100%)

g.title: Watchful Waiting
g.text: Watchful Waiting

g.title: Symptomatic?->Watchful Waiting
g.text: No; Asymptomatic; Size <3cm; Non-critical location (4%)

g.title: Treatment Decision
g.text: Treatment Decision

g.title: Symptomatic?->Treatment Decision
g.text: Yes; Symptomatic; Size >3cm; Critical location (95%)

g.title: Watchful Waiting->Watchful Waiting
g.text: Stable; No new symptoms; KPS stable; <1.5mm growth/year (14%)

g.title: Watchful Waiting->Treatment Decision
g.text: Tumor growth >1.5mm/year; New symptoms; KPS decline (51%)

g.title: Recurrence Evaluation
g.text: Recurrence Evaluation

g.title: Watchful Waiting->Recurrence Evaluation
g.text: New enhancement on MRI; Symptom recurrence; >6 months post-treatment (34%)

g.title: Surgery
g.text: Surgery

g.title: Treatment Decision->Surgery
g.text: Operable; Progressive symptoms; KPS >60; Size >3cm (59%)

g.title: Radiation
g.text: Radiation

g.title: Treatment Decision->Radiation
g.text: Inoperable; Size <3cm; Critical location; Patient preference (38%)

g.title: Palliative Care
g.text: Palliative Care

g.title: Treatment Decision->Palliative Care
g.text: Multiple recurrences; KPS <50; Extensive tumor burden (2%)

g.title: Recurrence Evaluation->Surgery
g.text: Operable; KPS >60; Limited prior radiation; Single recurrence (48%)

g.title: Recurrence Evaluation->Radiation
g.text: Inoperable; KPS >60; No prior radiation; Size <3cm (18%)

g.title: Recurrence Evaluation->Palliative Care
g.text: Multifocal recurrence; KPS <50; Limited treatment options (8%)

g.title: Systemic Therapy
g.text: Systemic Therapy

g.title: Recurrence Evaluation->Systemic Therapy
g.text: Multiple recurrences; Not candidate for surgery/radiation (24%)

g.title: Post-operative Evaluation
g.text: Post-operative Evaluation

g.title: Surgery->Post-operative Evaluation
g.text: Resection completed; Assess residual tumor; Simpson grade; Pathology (100%)

g.title: Treatment Response Evaluation
g.text: Treatment Response Evaluation

g.title: Radiation->Treatment Response Evaluation
g.text: SRS/IMRT completed; Assess tumor response; Monitor side effects (100%)

g.title: Symptom Management
g.text: Symptom Management

g.title: Palliative Care->Symptom Management
g.text: Focus on quality of life; Manage symptoms (57%)

g.title: Hospice Referral
g.text: Hospice Referral

g.title: Palliative Care->Hospice Referral
g.text: Rapid progression; KPS <40; Limited life expectancy (42%)

g.title: Post-operative Evaluation->Watchful Waiting
g.text: Total resection; Grade I; Stable symptoms; KPS >80 (34%)

g.title: Post-operative Evaluation->Radiation
g.text: Subtotal resection; Residual tumor >1cm; Critical location (19%)

g.title: Adjuvant Therapy Decision
g.text: Adjuvant Therapy Decision

g.title: Post-operative Evaluation->Adjuvant Therapy Decision
g.text: WHO Grade II/III; Atypical/Anaplastic features; High MIB-1 index (45%)

g.title: Adjuvant Therapy Decision->Watchful Waiting
g.text: WHO Grade II; Complete resection; Low MIB-1 index; Patient preference (6%)

g.title: Adjuvant Therapy Decision->Radiation
g.text: WHO Grade II; Simpson Grade II/III resection; High recurrence risk (86%)

g.title: Adjuvant Therapy Decision->Systemic Therapy
g.text: WHO Grade III; Genetic alterations (e.g., TERT); Rapid progression (6%)

g.title: Systemic Therapy->Palliative Care
g.text: Disease progression; KPS decline; Refractory to multiple treatments (47%)

g.title: Systemic Therapy->Treatment Response Evaluation
g.text: Assess tumor response; Monitor side effects (52%)

g.title: Treatment Response Evaluation->Watchful Waiting
g.text: Tumor shrinkage; Symptom improvement; Stable/No side effects (54%)

g.title: Treatment Response Evaluation->Treatment Decision
g.text: Tumor growth; Symptom progression; Intolerable side effects (2%)

g.title: Treatment Response Evaluation->Recurrence Evaluation
g.text: New lesions; Symptom recurrence; >6 months post-treatment (42%)

g.title: Symptom Management->Treatment Decision
g.text: Symptoms worsening; Affecting daily life; Patient preference (0%)
